help-file.title: ZEALOT
help-file.content:
The Zealot Cleric focuses on damage, with the Fighter skill "Offense" and the ability to call upon the God of Tempus to infuse them with power. Their offensive nature allows them to be extremely adept at fighting, particulary raiding.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Raised skill caps to 1h bludgeon 2h bludgeon dodge 51st level: Double attack
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Tempus God Call
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 11th circle: Plague
